name: Endless Tea Maker
description:
Fulfill the requests of an endless supply of customers to raise your score and avoid the game ending.

I made this as an entry for Trijam #156 (theme : tea time), the idea being to make a game in 3 hours. 

I failed to keep accurate timings, as I did it in small bursts over a weekend, but I'd say if it wasn't less than 3 it was certainly less than 4 :)

Controls

WASD -> Move your character/selected item

[SPACE] -> Make selection in front of kitchen items/customer/menu
